name: 2DShooter - Space Invaders
description:
Hi, my name is Ernie and this is my 2D Shooter for the assignment

My significant modifications are:

1. New Player sprites (idle animation)

2. Changed Player shoot mechanic (1 projectile on each side cannon)

3. Various texts triggered by box colliders

4. New win condition on Level 2 (you have to enter a box collider to win)

5. New enemy sprites (idle animation)

6. Added new sound effects for Level 1 and 3
